page.title: 06THE DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: At 7:10 my Mum wakes me up. "Times up David," she says. I jump out of bed grab my shirt and jump back into bed. Then I look at the time. It is getting late so I hurry up. At 7:20 I run down the stairs with my jumper half on. I have a quick breakfast of kellogg's Coco Pops then, I have a wash and clean my teeth. It is a messy job doing your teeth when you have got a brace. At 7:30 I do my piano practice which takes one hour. I do quite a few tunes. After an hour my Mum shouts, "Time's up." I jump in the car and go to school. I go into the playground. We have ten minutes play. After ten minutes I go into school. It is Friday so we take our Come & Praise hymn books out of our desks. We line up at the door with our hymn books for Mrs. Scholes' assembly. In the assembly Mrs. Scholes talks about the
